Uses of Interface
jakarta.nosql.column.ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    jakarta.nosql.column
    Defines the API to Column Family API in communication level.

    • Uses of ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder in jakarta.nosql.column

      Methods in jakarta.nosql.column that return ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.builder()
      It starts the first step of ColumnQuery creation using a builder pattern.
      static ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.builder​(String... documents)
      It starts the first step of ColumnQuery creation using a builder pattern.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.from​(String columnFamily)
      Define the column family in the query, this element is mandatory to build the ColumnQuery
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.limit​(long limit)
      Defines the maximum number of results to retrieve.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.select​(String column)
      Append a new column in the search result.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.select​(String... columns)
      Append new columns in the search result.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.skip​(long skip)
      Defines the position of the first result to retrieve.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.sort​(Sort sort)
      Append a new sort in the query.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.sort​(Sort... sorts)
      Append sorts in the query.
      ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder ColumnQuery.ColumnQueryBuilder.where​(ColumnCondition condition)
      Either add or replace the condition in the query.
